Description: Pottery shabti of Ğd-mwt with black painted detail: a lappet-wig, an unmodelled face with traced eyes and hands held together in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the concave back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
